io.github.theluca98.textapi

Class ActionBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.theluca98.textapi.ActionBar

  • public class ActionBar
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a message displayed above the hotbar.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static boolean DEBUG
      Used to toggle debug messages.

      • send

        @Deprecated
public static void send(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                     java.lang.String message)
        Deprecated. Please create a new ActionBar instance instead.
        This method has been kept just to ensure backwards compatibility with older versions of TextAPI. It is not supported and will be removed in a future release.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to send the message to.
        message - The message to send.
